title: [Large-Scale] Instructional Design Based on Psychological Process Evaluation for Web Design e-Learning Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic web design concepts and HTML/CSS fundamentals
context.additional_context: Web design education course integrating Gagné's theory and HCI elements in smartphone-based constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain web design principles with over 80% accuracy in e-learning content designed according to Gagné’s Nine Events theory
Learners can improve visual hierarchy design skills by 30% compared to baseline assessments in HCI-based interactive e-learning environments incorporating animation elements
Learners can self-assess changes in their cognitive processes (attention-comprehension-application stages) through formative assessment surveys

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
